short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends Photon and BullX with some useful features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Full feature list available upon install

Added option to display DexScreener banner within Photon.
Fixed "Freeze Buying" interface.
Fixed tabs below charts.
Restored dev profile.

Bug fixes for Limit Orders.

Added "Dev Profile" to pump.fun tokens.

Added a feature to protect from buying freezable tokens.

Fixed dev tx filter in top right information panel.

Link to Degen.Fund added where appropriate.

Further amendments made to accommodate "Watch button" with the additional links. 

Dex screener check now functions as expected even if there are no socials in contract.

Added toggle to remove icons from transactions for those that like a cleaner look.

Added "Increase Transaction Contrast" which slightly changes the colours used in transaction table.

Freeze Authority (Sol ONLY) has been added to the top right hand corner given the sudden appearance of honey pots lately.

Enhanced Chart Layout (All Chains)
Adds check for if DexScreener has been paid for (icon added to socials section)
Adds useful links to transactions, DexScreener, pump.fun where applicable.

UI tweaks to under-chart tables for smaller window sizes.

Enhanced Chart Layout (SOL only)
Holders and Liquidity information moved to the top right with price information, allowing more rapid evaluation of tokens.
Initial team allocation is now calculated and useless fields removed.

Pump.fun added to chart links where appropriate.

Auto Refresh Charts (All Chains)
Page will automatically refresh every 10 minutes when not in focus to release resources.

Auto Refresh New Pairs (All Chains)
Page will automatically refresh every 10 minutes when not in focus to release resources.

Open Charts in New Tabs (All Chains)
When charts are clicked from either new pairs or holdings, they will be opened in new windows / tabs automatically.
Search results still open within the same page.

Compact New Pairs Table (All Chains)
UI tweaks to new pairs table for smaller window sizes.
Additional modifications have been made for readability.

Additional New Pair Filters (All Chains)
The following additional filters are added to "New Pairs". The following additional filters are added to New Pairs. Filters are saved on a per chain basis.
With All 3 Socials => Only show new pairs with Twitter, Telegram and Website
Keywords (Include) => Only shows new pairs where ticker or name include the comma separated keywords
Keywords (Exclude) => Hides new pairs where ticker or name include the comma separated keywords
Liquidity to Market Cap Ratio => Can be used to hide obvious rugs where liquidity is significantly higher than market cap when set to 1.75
By Initial Liquidity => Only shows new pairs where initial liquidity is between the entered values.

More features to come!
